title: Assistant Professor of Computer Science
description: Seeking a dedicated and experienced individual to join our computer science department. Apply by June 30th. Joining date: August 1st.

title: Lecturer in Mathematics
description: We are looking for a passionate mathematics lecturer to inspire and educate our students. Apply by July 15th. Joining date: September 1st.

title: Research Associate in Biology
description: Join our research team to contribute to cutting-edge biological studies. Apply by August 10th. Joining date: October 1st.

title: Professor of English Literature
description: We are seeking a distinguished scholar in English literature to lead our department. Apply by September 5th. Joining date: January 1st.

title: Assistant Professor of Chemistry
description: Join our dynamic chemistry department and contribute to innovative research and teaching. Apply by October 15th. Joining date: January 15th.

title: Visiting Faculty in Economics
description: We are looking for a visiting faculty member in economics for the upcoming academic year. Apply by November 20th. Joining date: January 30th.

title: Assistant Professor of Psychology
description: Join our psychology department and contribute to both teaching and research endeavors. Apply by December 10th. Joining date: February 15th.
